So it's actually quite rare to find correct ones...

For D = 36:
ETA is around 10200 seconds -> 170 minutes
Script is given 14 minutes, so tries about 14/170 of the primes (only 1 will give correct factor)
Assuming chance of being possible is 1/4
Success rate of this is about 14/170 * 1/4 = 2.06%
To have >50% success chance, must run the program 34 times
Assume program runs once every 15 minutes on average

>50% = 34 times = 8.5 hours
>75% = 67 times = 16.75 hours

One night is around 8.5 hours, so 50% chance of working overnight
If run this every night, it'll work...

Or... For D = 34:
ETA is around 2400 seconds -> 40 minutes
Script is given 14 minutes, so tries about 14/40 of the primes
Chance of being possible is ~1/16
Success rate of this is about 14/40 * 1/16 = 2.19%

>50% = 32 times = 8 hours
